90444.『王家の迷宮へ行く』では 王家の迷宮へ\n冒険に出発します。迷宮には アンルシア:
In Going to the Royal Labyrinth, you're going on an adventure to the Royal Labyrinth... In the labyrinth, you can take Anglesea and her
fellow monsters with you... In the labyrinth, when the glow of courage in the upper left corner of the screen reaches zero, you'll be
thrown out. Defeat monsters and collect light balls as you move on to the next room before the glow of courage runs out... To get to the
labyrinth, you need <%dL_KISEKI_NUM> gems of courage. You can get <%dL_WEEK_NUM> bravery stones per week... In the "Prepare for
Unlucia" section, you can change Unlucia's equipment, assign skills, and more... If you have a dress-up outfit, you can also change
her outfit... In "Increase Blackstone" you can increase the number of brilliance stones by offering the brilliance stone belts found
in the Royal Labyrinth... You can increase the effectiveness of your belt of brilliance to a maximum of four by using an item called
the Secret Stone of Awakening. You can get it from the special monster that appears in the Royal Labyrinth, Yumemi's Incarnation, which
drops it from Yumemi's Dark Box. Also, defeating the incarnation of Yumemi will raise your treasure level. The higher your
treasure level, the more likely it is that the incarnation of Yumemi will drop a high- value box, such as the Dark Box of Yumemi.

123486.王家の迷宮は アンルシアと\n仲間モンスターを連れていくことができる\nソロプレ:
The Royal Maze is a solo-player dungeon where you are accompanied by Anlucia and a fellow monster (if you choose).
To enter, you'll need <%dL_KISEKI_NUM> Courage Augite. You will accumulate <%dL_WEEK_NUM> of them to use per week.
Selecting "Get Augite" will allow you to obtain more Courage Augite by offering Augite Belts found from the maze.
While inside the maze, the Sparks of Courage counter at the upper-left corner of the screen will gradually count down.
When this number reaches 0, you will be forcibly removed from the maze.
The key is to defeat monsters and collect Orbs of Light to increase your Sparks of Courage while progressing to the room ahead.
The Orbs of Light you collect will turn into Sparks of Courage in the next room, and any remaining Sparks you had will disappear.
Sparks of Courage are used for various things inside the maze. Be mindful not to use them too much.

123487.『アンルシアの準備』から アンルシアの装備変更\nスキル振り分けなど 各種設定が:
From "Preparing for Anlucia" you can change Anlucia's equipment, assign her skills, and more. If you have a dress-up outfit, you can
change her outfit... In the labyrinth, you can also change her mission from "Anlucia" in the main command...

123488.王家の迷宮を進めていくと 迷宮の中に\nゆめみの化身と ボーナスミミックという\:
As you progress through the maze, special monsters called "Dream Avatars" and "Bonus Mimics" will begin to appear.
Both of these monsters will always drop a Dream Box upon defeat.
Each time a Dream Avatar is defeated, your Treasure Level increases, which makes it more likely that a better box will drop.
However, this also increases the chance it will appear as a stronger version, so you must decide if this risk is worth the reward.
Defeating a Bonus Mimic may trigger a Fever, causing more Bonus Mimics to appear nearby.
This is your chance to get more Dream Boxes, but Bonus Mimics will not drop Sparks of Courage or Orbs of Light when defeated.
Make sure to be mindful of your remaining Sparks of Courage!

123489.めざめの秘石は 王家の迷宮に出現する\nスペシャルモンスター ゆめみの化身が落と:
The Secret Stone of Awakening is an item that can be obtained from Yumemi's Dark Box, which is dropped by the special monster Yumemi
Incarnate that appears in the Royal Labyrinth. If you have the Mezame no Hideshi, you can use it to increase the effects of
your pyrotechnic belt to a maximum of four...

123500.<color_yellow>\n『封印の砂』の説明です！\n<br>\n『封印の:
This will explain "Sealed Sand"!
By selecting "Get Sealed Sand", you'll be able to offer your Augite Belts at the door in order to receive some.
The sand can be used to seal various effects. Once an effect is sealed, it will not appear on any future Augite Belts you obtain.

267484.心層の迷宮は アンルシアと仲間モンスターと共に\n特徴が異なる３種類のダンジョン:
This is a game where you'll be able to take on three different types of dungeons, each with its own unique characteristics. You'll
be able to get more experience and gold with each level you complete, but the bosses will also get a little stronger. You can challenge
the labyrinth of the level that suits you...
